resources.string: Please enter a value for at least one fields
Please enter a positive value for all fields
Please enter a value for seconds less than 60
Please enter a value for minutes less than 60
Please enter a value for hours less than 24

" I developed the \"Tymer\" timer app for a college assignment. It's a user-friendly timer application that allows users to create and manage timers for different activities. Users can set the duration for each timer and assign names to them. The app helps users stay organized and on track with their tasks."
